title: Manton Dumville
deck:
Helen and I have been members of Gateway Church since the very beginning in 1981. Over the years we have been involved in worship, trustees, food bank, kids work and leading Lifegroups.

We now find ourselves once again stepping in to happily host a group temporarily until life returns to something more like normal.

We have 4 grown up children who all grew up in Gateway. and 13 grandchildren who keep us on our toes.
